entry.tran: (总是煽动事端的)狂热分子;(尤指)政治煽动者
entry.def: If you describe someone as a firebrand, especially someone who is very active in politics, you mean that they are always trying to make people take strong action.

example.tran: 他作为一名年轻的政治煽动者的名声

means.word_mean: 1. a piece of wood that has been burned or is burning

sentences.sentence: "she was the instigator of their quarrel"
